name: Coinbond
description: Coinbond is a decentralized cryptocurrency platform; that provides various financial services based on Blockchain technology, Staking, NFT, P2E, Metaverse, Web3.0 user experience in the crypto scene. The Coinbond token, intended to be a metaverse, NFT and virtual gaming ecosystem, is being shaped around a universe project for investors that is ready to be discovered, unique and built entirely by its users.
